title: How do I upload previously downloaded music into video editing application?
content: As stated above, I am attempting to upload music previously downloaded off of Google Play Music into a video editing application. I have tried using InShot, Viva Video, Videoshop and others. However when attempting to upload the file, I receive the error message "This kind of file is not supported by InShot (Or other video editing application)". Could you please help me fix this issue?
